metadata.title: Gilani commends security forces for foiling terrorist attack in Mir Ali

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 17 (APP): Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani Friday, lauded the security forces for successfully thwarting the terrorist attack in Mir Ali. He said that the nation takes great pride in the professionalism, courage, and resolve of its valiant soldiers who have once again defeated the nefarious designs of the enemies of peace. The Chairman Senate stated that the continuous efforts, vigilance, and unwavering determination of the security forces in the fight against terrorism are a source of pride and reassurance for the entire nation. He said this successful operation has once again reaffirmed that Pakistan's security institutions will never allow the enemies of peace and stability to succeed in their malicious objectives. Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani further said that the entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with its security forces, whose bravery, discipline, and patriotism symbolise the unity and strength of the country. He expressed the hope that with the same resolve and solidarity, the nation will succeed in completely eradicating terrorism and extremism from the country.
